Class InternManImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.glasgow.internman.impl.InternManImpl

    public class InternManImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements InternMan
    A realisation of the facade interface InternMan
    Author:
    Hector Grebbell, Michael Kilian, Tony Lau, Peeranat Fupongsiripan

      • getAdvertisements

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Advertisement> getAdvertisements()
        get set of advertisements. Each ad has a unique integer label. Filter as follows: - student sees all published adverts - employer sees all adverts it has posted - co-ordinator sees all adverts
        Specified by:
        getAdvertisements in interface InternMan

      • getStudents

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Student> getStudents()
        get set of students who are eligible to apply for placements. Map is keyed on GUID as string.
        Specified by:
        getStudents in interface InternMan

      • registerNewEmployer

        public Employer registerNewEmployer(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String emailAddress)
        coordinator only. Sets up new employer in system. This should automatically create an account (username/password) for that employer.
        Specified by:
        registerNewEmployer in interface InternMan

      • getCurrentEmployer

        Get handle on currently selected employer.
        Specified by:

      • createNewAdvertisement

        public Advertisement createNewAdvertisement(java.lang.String applicationDetails)
        coordinator and employer. Adds a new (not-yet-approved) advert into the system. Advert is tagged with creator name and date. Details about the placement and how to apply are included in the monolithic string.
        Specified by:
        createNewAdvertisement in interface InternMan

      • selectAdvertisement

        public Advertisement selectAdvertisement(java.lang.Integer index)
        all users. Get a handle on advert with supplied index. Note that this should return null if user does not have privileges to view this advert (unpublished to student, or not created by this employer).
        Specified by:
        selectAdvertisement in interface InternMan

      • selectRole

        public Role selectRole(java.lang.Integer advertisementIndex,
              java.lang.Integer roleIndex)
        gets handle on a role for an advertisement, specified by index. Same permissions constraints apply as for selectAdvertisement
        Specified by:
        selectRole in interface InternMan

      • selectStudent

        public Student selectStudent(java.lang.String matriculation)
        coordinator only. Gets handle on Student from supplied id. Returns null if student not in students map
        Specified by:
        selectStudent in interface InternMan

      • publishAdvertisement

        public void publishAdvertisement(java.lang.Integer advertisementIndex,
                        java.lang.String comment)
        coordinator only. Makes ad visible to students. Sends feedback to employer by email.
        Specified by:

      • approveAcceptedOffer

        public void approveAcceptedOffer(java.lang.String matriculation)
        coordinator only. Approves offer most recently accepted by student with this matriculation id.
        Specified by:

      • createNewSelfSourcedRole

        public Role createNewSelfSourcedRole(java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String location,
                            java.util.Date start,
                            java.util.Date end,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            java.lang.Double salary)
        student only. Inform coordinator of independently arranged placement. Sends email to coordinator, sets up new placement details in database. Coordinator must explicitly approve self sourced role.
        Specified by:
        createNewSelfSourcedRole in interface InternMan

      • assignAcademicVisitor

        public void assignAcademicVisitor(java.lang.String matriculation,

        not implemented in current iteration coordinator only. Sends email to student, visitor and employer manager to let them know about assignment.
        Specified by:
        assignAcademicVisitor in interface InternMan
